pull.title: gettransaction RPC for non-wallet transactions
pull.body:
Works for wallet transactions, memory-pool transaction and block chain
transactions.

Available for all:
- txid
- version
- locktime
- size
- coinbase/inputs/outputs
- confirmations

Available only for wallet transactions:
- amount
- fee
- details
- blockindex

Available for wallet transactions and block chain transactions:
- blockhash
- time

events.body: Sanity tested OK; would be nice if it checked the memory pool for 0-confirmation "other people's" transactions.
Much more complete and totally reworked version pushed.

issue.title: More details for getblock and gettransaction
issue.body:
Add block "confirmations" to getblock, mainly for identifying orphans

---

Second parameter to JSON-RPC getblock/gettransaction: decompositions

This is an Object specifying how to decompose specific elements.
Currently supported:
- "tx": "no", "hash", "hex", "obj"
- "script": "no", "hex", "asm", "obj"

---

Note that this depends on pulls #841 (sipa/getalltransactions) and #885 (luke-jr/getblock_cleanup), so the diff includes those until they are merged.

events.body: Needs rebasing. Sipa broke everything using locks. >_<
This needs rebasing (merges clean, but won't build)

comments.body: Doesn't this ReadFromDisk() fail for memory pool transactions?  I could've sworn memory pool txns weren't written to disk until they were included in a block...
